page.title: 10Religion in Llanelli.
page.content: There are many religious denominations in Llanelli.These are:_Church in Wales,Roman Catholic,Presbyterian Church in Wales, Baptist,Evangelical ,Salvation Army,Church of Latter Day Saints, Independent,Spiritualists and The Apostolic Church. THE CHURCH IN WALES. There are three Parishes in our block.They are Llanelli Parish,Saint Paul's Parish and Christ Church Parish.In the Llanelli Parish are four Churches.The Parish Church,All Saints,Saint Albans and Furnace.Services are held in Welsh in the Parish Church and in English in the other Churches.In common with most other denominations in Llanelli there are usually English and Welsh Churches.There are English and Welsh Baptist Chapels, for instance.
